ingredients: 1/4 cup white vinegar or lemon juice (for quick pickling)
1/4 cup sliced almonds or cashews, toasted
steps: Divide biryani rice among serving bowls
Add dollops of raita, pickled red onions, reserved crispy onions, and fresh cilantro
Garnish with toasted nuts, hard-boiled eggs (if using), and lemon wedges
title: Chicken Tikka Biryani Bowl
